name: Captain Cato Sicarius
text: [REACTION]: After an enemy unit at this planet is destroyed, gain 1 [RESOURCE].
flavor: "We are the slayers of kings, the destroyers of worlds, the bringers of ruination and death in all its forms."

name: Colonel Straken
text: Each other Soldier or Warrior unit you control at this planet gets +1 ATK.
flavor: "Damn it, follow me.  I'll show you how it's done."

name: Nazdreg
text: Each other unit you control at this planet gains Brutal. (Each unit with Brutal gets +1 ATK for each damage on it.)
flavor: "Allright you gitz! Time fer da 'umies to see wot it means ta mess wit da Bad Moons!"

name: Zarathur, High Sorcerer
text: [INTERRUPT]: When damage is assigned to an enemy unit at this planet, increase that damage by 1.
flavor: "Let me show you the true power of Chaos!"

name: Packmaster Kith
text: [REACTION]: After this warlord commits to a planet, put a Khymera token into play at this planet.
flavor: "Pain is an art, and the coliseum my canvas."

name: Eldorath Starbane
text: [REACTION]: After this warlord commits to a planet, exhaust a target non-warlord unit at that planet.
flavor: "The gaze of Alaitoc see all, there will be no escape for you"

name: Commander Shadowsun
text: [REACTION]: After this warlord commits to a planet, put a [TAU] attachment with printed cost 2 or lower or "Shadowsun's Stealth Cadre" from your hand or discard pile into play attached to an eligible unit at this planet.
flavor: "We act as one, and united we cannot fall."

name: Sicarius's Chosen
text: [REACTION]: After this unit enters play, move a target enemy army unit at an adjacent planet to this planet and deal it 1 damage.

name: Cato's Stronghold
text: [REACTION]: After an enemy unit is destroyed, exhaust this support to ready a target [SPACE MARINE] unit at the same planet.
flavor: Within the walls of this impregnable fortress, Captain Sicarius crafts his brilliant strategies and perfects the deadly are of war.

name: The Fury of Sicarius
text: [REACTION]: After a [SPACE MARINE] unit damages an enemy non-warlord unit by an attack, destroy the attacked unit.

name: Tallassarian Tempest Blade
text:
Attach to a unique unit.
Attached unit gets +1 ATK and gains Armorbane.

name: 10th Company Scout
flavor: With enough time these scouts learn what it truly means to be an Adeptus Astartes, and Angel of Death.

name: Honored Librarian
text: Enemy units cannot attack this unit while you control a unit not named "Honored Librarian" at this planet.

name: Blood Angels Veterans
text: While this unit is ready, it gains, "Interrupt: When this unit is assigned damage, prevent 1 of that damage."

name: Land Raider
text: Non-Vehicle units you control at this planet cannot be targeted by enemy card abilities.

name: Ultramarines Dreadnought
flavor: An ancient warrior is entombed within the heart of each of these mighty devices, mortally wounded but kept alive with the help of lost technology.

name: Veteran Brother Maxos
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Pay the printed cost of a [SPACE MARINE] unit in your hand to put it into play at this planet.
flavor: "Death to the foul Xenos! Vengeance for Macragge!" -Veteran Brother Maxos

name: Eager Recruit
flavor: Many Space Marine recruits leap into action with little regard for themselves, desiring to prove themselves to their battle-brothers.

name: Iron Hands Techmarine
text: This unit gains 1 command icon for each enemy unit at this planet.
flavor: Trained by the Adeptus Mechanicus on Mars, the Techmarines are stewards of their chapter's weaponry and vehicles.

name: Deathwing Guard
flavor: "Where they stand, none shall pass." -Grand Master Belial

name: Drop Pod Assault
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Target a planet where a battle is taking place. Search the top 6 cards of your deck for a [SPACE MARINE] unit with printed cost 3 or lower. Put that unit into play at the targeted planet, and place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Indomitable
text: [REACTION]: After a [SPACE MARINE] unit is assigned damage by an attack, prevent all of that damage.
flavor: "On our house and for the Emperor, we shall not fall!" -Brother Vandius, Ultramarines

name: Exterminatus
text: [DEPLOY ACTION]: Destroy all non-unique units at a target non-first planet.
flavor: When a threat is so great that not even the Space Marines can conquer it, obliteration is the only option.

name: Godwyn Pattern Bolter
text:
Attach to an army unit.
Attached unit gets +1 ATK, +1 HP and while it is attacking ignores the Flying keyword on enemy units.

name: Iron Halo
text:
Attach to a unique unit.
[REACTION]: After attached unit is assigned damage by an attack, exhaust this attachment to prevent all of that damage.

name: Fortress-Monastery
text: [INTERRUPT]: When you deploy a [SPACE MARINE] unit, exhaust this support to reduce that unit's cost by 1.

name: Holy Sepulchre
text: [REACTION]: After a [SPACE MARINE] unit enters your discard pile from play, exhaust this support to return that unit to your hand.

name: Straken's Command Squad
text: [INTERRUPT]: When this unit leaves play, put a Guardsman token into play at the same planet.

name: Omega Zero Command
text: [REACTION]: After you win a command struggle, put a Guardsman token into play at that planet.
flavor: An iron bastion from which to stem the flow of enemy assaults.

name: Glorious Intervention
text: [REACTION]: After a unit is assigned damage by an attack, sacrifice a Soldier or Warrior unit at the same planet to prevent all of that damage. Then, deal X damage to the attacker. X is the sacrificed unit's printed ATK value.

name: Straken's Cunning
text:
Attach to an army unit.
Attached unit gets +1 ATK.
[INTERRUPT]: When attached unit leaves play, draw 3 cards.

name: Cadian Mortar Squad
text: [REACTION]: After an army unit you control at this planet leaves play, ready this unit.

name: Sanctioned Psyker
flavor: Each psyker is a calculated risk for the Astra Militarum.  Though trained to resist the dangers of the warp, one slip of thier vigilance can see them bound to the power of Chaos.

name: Leman Russ Battle Tank
flavor: "What I cannot crush with words, I will crush with the tanks of the Imperial Guard!" -Lord Solar Macharius

name: Captain Markis
text: [ACTION]: Sacrifice an [ASTRA MILITARUM] unit at this planet to exhaust a target non-warlord unit at this planet. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "A good soldier obeys without question. A good officer commands without doubt." -Tactica Imperialis

name: Enginseer Augur
text: [INTERRUPT]: When this unit leaves play, search the top 6 cards of your deck for an [ASTRA MILITARUM] support card with printed cost 2 or lower. Put that card into play at your HQ, and place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Penal Legionnaire
flavor: "Only in death shall my crimes be forgiven." -Penal Legionnaire XXVII

name: Infantry Conscripts
text: This unit gets +2 ATK for each support card you control.
flavor: They may be outmatched, but they are never outnumbered.

name: Elysian Assault Team
text: [INTERRUPT]: When a Soldier or Warrior unit you control leaves play from a planet, put this unit into play from your hand at the same planet.

name: Preemptive Barrage
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Target up to 3 [ASTRA MILITARUM] units you control at the same planet. Each targeted unit gains Ranged until the end of the phase. (Units with Ranged attack during the ranged skirmish at the beginning of a battle.)

name: Suppressive Fire
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Exhaust a unit you control to exhaust a target non-warlord unit at the same planet.
flavor: "Let's see them charge through this!" -Corporal Valz

name: Hostile Environment Gear
text:
Attach to an army unit.
Attached unit gets +3 HP.
flavor: The Cadian tri-dome helmet and mark XI re-breather are renowned for their defense against environmental toxins and noxious gasses.

name: Bodyguard
text:
Attach to an army unit you control.
[FORCED REACTION]: After a unit you control is assigned damage by an attack at this planet, reassign 1 of that damage to attached unit.

name: Imperial Bunker
text: [INTERRUPT]: When you deploy an [ASTRA MILITARUM] unit, exhaust this support to reduce that unit's cost by 1.

name: Rockcrete Bunker
text:
If this card has 4 or more damage on it, sacrifice it.
[REACTION]: When damage is assigned to a unit you control, exhaust this support to reassign 1 of that damage to this support.

name: Catachan Outpost
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Exhaust this support to give a target unit +2 ATK for its next attack this phase.
flavor: Capturing it was easy. Keeping it was the tricky part.

name: Nazdreg's Flash Gitz
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Deal this unit 1 damage to ready it. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: The only thing Flash Gitz like better than shooting guns is shooting loud guns

name: Kraktoof Hall
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Exhaust this support to move 1 damage from a target unit you control to another target unit at the same planet.

name: Bigga Is Betta
text: [INTERRUPT]: When you deploy an [ORK] unit, reduce its cost by 2. Deal 1 damage to that unit after it enters play.
flavor: "Puny 'umies! I iz da biggest!" -Bad Moons Maganob

name: Cybork Body
text:
Attach to an army unit.
Double attached unit's HP.
flavor: Ork physiology is extremely resilient and adapts to even the most crude cybernetics with ease.

name: Sniveling Grot
flavor: In battle, Grots swarm their foes, making up for their weak bodies with sheer numbers.

name: Goff Nob
flavor: "We're da best. Think different do ya? Come and have a go then, ya runty little wimp!" -Gasgrakh, Goff Nob

name: Weirdboy Maniak
text: [REACTION]: After this unit enters play, deal 1 damage to each other unit at this planet.
flavor: Weirdboyz cannot control their ability to absorb psychic energy, much to the detriment of both their foes and allies.

name: Tankbusta Bommaz
text: This unit deals double damage to enemy Vehicle units.
flavor: "It's a hamma! Wiv a rokkit! We'z need two!" -Tankbusta Grazguz

name: Enraged Ork
flavor: "Get 'em boyz! Dakka dakka dakka!" -Rotgrob, Ork Strategist

name: Crushface
text: [INTERRUPT]: When you deploy another [ORK] unit at this planet, reduce its cost by 1.
flavor: "I smashed more 'umies dan you lot put togetta! Stay outta my way or I smash you too!" -Crushface

name: Bad Dok
text: This unit gains 3 command icons while it is damaged.
flavor: "Not dat one! Da uvver arm! ARGH!" -Snagruk, Ork Patient

name: Rokkitboy
text: Each enemy unit at this planet loses the Flying keyword.
flavor: What goes up...

name: Goff Boyz
text: This unit gets +3 ATK while it is at the first planet.
flavor: "We're Orks, and we was made ta fight and win." -Ghazghkull Mag Uruk Thraka

name: Shoota Mob
flavor: The 'Shoota' is the most common type of Ork projectile weapon and has no standard design.

name: Burna Boyz
text: [REACTION]: After this unit declares an attack against an enemy unit, deal 1 damage to a different enemy unit at the same planet.

name: Battle Cry
text:
Play only during a battle.
[COMBAT ACTION]: Each [ORK] unit you control gets +2 ATK until the end of the battle.
flavor: WAAAGH!!!

name: Snotling Attack
text: [DEPLOY ACTION]: Put 4 Snotlings tokens into play divided among any number of planets.
flavor: They are used for food, as common fodder, and sometimes even as ammunition.

name: Squig Bombin'
text: [ACTION]: Destroy a target support card.
flavor: "HAHAHA! GO BOOM!" -Gurt, Gretchin Squigherder, last words

name: Rokkit Launcha
text:
Attach to an army unit.
Attached unit gains Ranged.

name: Ork Kannon
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Exhaust this support to target a planet. Each player deals 1 indirect damage among the units he controls at that planet.

name: Bigtoof Banna
text: [INTERRUPT]: When you deploy an [ORK] unit, exhaust this support to reduce that unit's cost by 1.

name: Tellyporta Pad
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Exhaust this support to move an [ORK] unit you control to the first planet.
flavor: "There is no way this... affront to the Machine God can function!" -Tech-Priest Olagoth

name: Zarathur's Flamers
text: [ACTION]: Sacrifice this unit to deal 2 damage to a target non-warlord unit at the same planet.

name: Shrine of Warpflame
text: [REACTION]: After an enemy unit is destroyed, exhaust this support to return the topmost Tzeentch card from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Infernal Gateway
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Put a [CHAOS] unit with printed cost 3 or lower into play from your hand at a planet. If that unit is still in play at the end of the phase, sacrifice it.

name: Mark of Chaos
text:
Attach to an army unit.
[INTERRUPT]: When attached unit leaves play, deal 1 damage to each enemy unit at this planet.
flavor: Both a gift and a curse.

name: Alpha Legion Infiltrator
flavor: The Alpha Legion sows Chaos Cults across the galaxy in order to further their heretical plots to unknown ends. It is rare to see the members of the Legion gather in large numbers

name: Possessed
flavor: These Chaos Space Marines give themselves willingly to the powers of Chaos, their bodies taken over in times of battle and twisted into horrible forms.

name: Splintered Path Acolyte
text: [INTERRUPT]: When you deploy a Daemon unit, sacrifice this unit to reduce its cost by 2.
flavor: "I gladly give my life for the machinations of Tzeentch" - Cultist of the Splintered Path

name: Khorne Berzerker
flavor: "Blood for the Blood God!" -World Eater's Battle Cry

name: Umbral Preacher
text: Each army unit at this planet cannot retreat from battle.
flavor: There is no escape from the gods of Chaos, for they lurk in the hearts of all mortals.

name: Ravenous Flesh Hounds
text: [ACTION]: Sacrifice a Cultist unit to remove all damage from this unit.

name: Virulent Plague Squad
text: This unit gets +1 ATK for each unit in your opponent's discard pile.
flavor: "I shall reap a terrible bounty from the death that I saw in your name, Father Nurgle..." -Typhus the Traveller, Herald of Nurgle

name: Chaos Fanatics
flavor: "Sanity is for the weak, Chaos is eternal." - Cultist Chant.

name: Soul Grinder
text: [REACTION]: After you win a command struggle at this planet, your opponent must sacrifice a non-warlord unit at the same planet, if able.

name: Xavaes Split-Tongue
text: [REACTION]: After an enemy unit at this planet is destroyed, put a Cultist token into play at your HQ.
flavor: "Join me and serve the Prince of Pleasure, or die beneath my blade!" -Xavaes Split-Tongue

name: Warpstorm
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Deal 2 damage to each unit without any attachments at a target planet or HQ.
flavor: In the end, the Warp will consume all things.

name: Tzeentch's Firestorm
text: [ACTION]: Deal X damage to a target non-warlord unit.
flavor: The fires of Tzeentch burn not just flesh and bone, but your very soul.

name: Promise of Glory
text: [DEPLOY ACTION]: Put 2 Cultist tokens into play at your HQ.
flavor: "The hidden glories of the Immaterium lie all around waiting for us to notice and claim them as our birthright" -Demagogue Xentries

name: Rune-Encrusted Armor
text:
Attach to an army unit.
Attached unit gets +2 ATK and +2 HP.
flavor: "Impurity shall be our armor, and hate shall be our weapon." -Acrus the Defiled, Black Legion

name: Dire Mutation
text:
Attach to an army unit.
[FORCED INTERRUPT]: When attached unit exhaust, deal it 1 damage.

name: Fortress of Madness
text: [INTERRUPT]: When you deploy a [CHAOS] unit, exhaust this support to reduce that unit's cost by 1.

name: Murder Cogitator
text: [REACTION]: After a or unit you control leaves play, exhaust this support to reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a [CHAOS] unit, add it to your hand.

name: Kith's Khymeramasters
text: [REACTION]: After this unit enters play, put a Khymera token into play at this planet.
flavor: Returning from a dangerous dream quest, with an entire pack of Khymerae...

name: Khymera Den
text: [ACTION]: Exhaust this support to move any number of Khymera tokens you control to a target planet.
flavor: The Warp-Beasts known as Khymerae form around vivid nightmares, taking the shape of a horrifying beast.

name: Pact of the Haemonculi
text: [DEPLOY ACTION]: Sacrifice a unit to discard 1 card at random from your opponent's hand. Then, draw 2 cards.

name: Agonizer of Bren
text:
Attach to an army unit.
Attached unit gets +1 ATK for each Khymera token you control.
flavor: The Beastmaster Bren created the Agonizers to lead packs of Khymerae into battle.

name: Incubus Warrior
flavor: Incubi are the elite warriors of the Dark Eldar, trained exclusively in the murderous acts. They strive only to kill as often and as quickly as possible.

name: Haemonculus Tormentor
text: [ACTION]: Pay 1  to give this unit +2 ATK until the end of the phase.
flavor: No amount of agony can quench his thirst for suffering.

name: Hellion Gang
flavor: Packs of vicious Hellions roam the alleys of Commorragh, killing all who cross thier path.

name: Beasthunter Wyches
text: [REACTION]: After you play a [DARK ELDAR] event card, pay 1  to put a Khymera token into play at your HQ.

name: Baleful Mandrake
flavor: Mandrakes will channel the pain of their victims into 'Baleblasts' of cold fire, freezing their foes in place.

name: Black Heart Ravager
text: [REACTION]: After this unit damages non-warlord unit, rout this unit.

name: Murder of Razorwings
text: [REACTION]: After you deploy this unit, discard 1 card at random from your opponent's hand.
flavor: Attacking in a wild stream of knife sharp feathers and razored beaks...

name: Coliseum Fighters
text: [REACTION]: After this unit enters play, return the topmost event card from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Syren Zythlex
text: [REACTION]: After an enemy unit is deployed at this planet, exhaust it.
flavor: "You'll be my prey for today, try not to die too quickly." -Syren Zythlex

name: Power from Pain
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Your opponent must sacrifice an army unit, if able.
flavor: Their screams filled him with delight, their souls filled him with power.

name: Archon's Terror
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Rout a target non-unique unit.
flavor: "You think to challenge me, pitiful human? I, the bane of empires, the father of pain? Let me educate you; I need a new pet..." -Archon K'shaic, Kabal of the Bladed Lotus

name: Raid
text: [ACTION]: Take 1 [RESOURCE] from your opponent if he has more resources than you.

name: Suffering
text:
Attach to an army unit.
Attached unit gets -2 ATK.
flavor: "Death? My dear plaything, you miss the point." -Urien Rakarth, Master Haemonculus

name: Hypex Injector
text:
Attach to an army unit.
After you play a [DARK ELDAR] event card, ready attached unit.

name: Altar of Torment
text: [INTERRUPT]: When you deploy a [DARK ELDAR] unit, exhaust this support to reduce that unit's cost by 1.

name: Twisted Laboratory
text: [ACTION]: Exhaust this support to treat the printed text box of a target army unit as if it were blank (except for Traits) until the end of the phase.

name: Starbane's Council
text: This unit gets +2 ATK while attacking an exhausted unit.
flavor: Starbane's most trusted advisors are also his most deadly bodyguards.

name: Alaitoc Shrine
text: [REACTION]: After an [ELDAR] unit moves to a planet, exhaust this support to ready that unit.
flavor: A great monolith declaring the greatness of the Craftworld, and a warning to all who would dare assail it.

name: Foresight
text: [REACTION]: After your warlord commits to a planet, commit it to a different planet.
flavor: "I have seen the infinite possibilities of the future, their twisting paths and hidden truths." -Eldorath Starbane

name: Mobility
text:
Attach to an army unit.
Attached unit gains Mobile.

name: Biel-Tan Guardians
flavor: The Eldar Guardians are the militia of the Craftworld, called upon to defend their home in times of war.

name: Eldar Survivalist
text:
+1 [Card] when command struggle won at this planet.
+1 [RESOURCE] when command struggle won at this planet.
flavor: Freed from the constraints of the Eldar Path, these outcasts are free to explore the galaxy, but remain ever vigilant of dangers to their race.

name: Wildrider Squadron
text: [COMBAT ACTION]: Move this unit to an adjacent planet. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Wailing Wraithfighter
text: [REACTION]: After this unit is declared as an attacker, your opponent must choose and discard 1 card from his hand, if able.

name: Iyanden Wraithguard
flavor: These wraithbane shells are animated by the Spirit Stone of a deceased Eldar warrior.  They are called upon only in times of great need.

name: Shrouded Harlequin
text: [INTERRUPT]: When this unit is destroyed, exhaust a target enemy unit at a planet of your choice.
flavor: They wander from Craftworld to Craftworld recounting Eldar history in intricate performances.

name: Swordwind Farseer
text: [REACTION]: After this unit enters play, search the top 6 cards of your deck for a card. Add it to your hand, and place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Silvered Blade Avengers
text: [REACTION]: After this unit is declared as an attacker against a non-warlord unit, exhaust that unit.
flavor: Dire Avengers of the Silvered Blade Shrine rely on devastating assaults to pin foes, ensuring they are unable to strike back.

name: Biel-Tan Warp Spiders
text: [REACTION]: After this unit is declared as an attacker, look at the top 2 cards of any player's deck. You may discard one of those cards.

name: Spiritseer Erathal
text: [REACTION]: After this unit is declared as an attacker, remove 1 damage from another target unit at this planet.
flavor: "I commune with the fallen so that the living may thrive" -Spiritseer Erathal

name: Superiority
text: [INTERRUPT]: When a command struggle at a planet begins, a target army unit at that planet loses all command icons until the end of that command struggle.

name: Nullify
text: [INTERRUPT]: When your opponent plays an event card, exhaust a unique [ELDAR] unit to cancel its effects.
flavor: "Your plans are undone, your strategies rendered worthless. Prepare to die." -Warlock Saetheis

name: Doom
text: [DEPLOY ACTION]: Destroy each non-unique unit at each player's HQ.
flavor: "I have seen the future, and it is death." -Farseer Avenelle

name: Gift of Isha
text: [ACTION]: Put the topmost [ELDAR] unit from your discard pile into play at a planet. If that unit is still in play at the end of the phase, discard it.

name: Banshee Power Sword
text:
Attach to an army unit.
Attached unit gets +1 ATK.
[INTERRUPT]: When attached unit declares an attack against a non-warlord unit, discard X cards from your hand to give attached unit +X ATK for that attack.

name: Corsair Trading Port
text: [INTERRUPT]: When you deploy an [ELDAR] unit, exhaust this support to reduce that unit's cost by 1.

name: Craftworld Gate
text: [ACTION]: Exhaust this support to return a target army unit you control to your hand.
flavor: The Webway allows the Eldar to move across the galaxy without risking the perils of the Warp.

name: Shadowsun's Stealth Cadre
text: This card may enter play as an attachment with the text: "Attach to a non-Vehicle army unit. Attached unit gets +2 ATK and +2 HP."

name: Communications Relay
text: [INTERRUPT]: When your opponent triggers an ability that targets a unit you control with 1 or more attachments, exhaust this support to cancel its effects.

name: Squadron Redeployment
text: [ACTION]: Exhaust an army unit with 1 or more attachments to move it to a planet of your choice.
flavor: The Tau are extremely adaptable, even in battle, quickly moving from front to front as needed

name: Command-Link Drone
text:
Attach to a unique unit.
Attached unit gets +1 ATK.
[ACTION]: Pay 1 [RESOURCE] to attach this card to a different unit.

name: Recon Drone
flavor: Tau drones can scour a battlefield in moments, detecting enemy units and pinpointing vulnerable formations.

name: Carnivore Pack
text: [INTERRUPT]: When this unit is destroyed, gain 3 [RESOURCE].
flavor: After battle, the Kroot will consume the flesh of their enemeies as well as their own dead, preserving their warrior spirits.

name: Vash'ya Trailblazer
flavor: Tau of the Air Caste are the pilots of the Tau fleets, spending most of their lives on space stations or traveling on ships.

name: Fire Warrior Elite
text: [INTERRUPT]: When an enemy unit would declare an attack against a unit you control at this planet, declare this unit as the defender instead.

name: Fire Warrior Strike Team
text: This unit gets +1 ATK for each attachment on it.
flavor: Fire Warriors are outfitted with a number of advance Tau technologies, giving them a distinct edge on the battlefield

name: Earth Caste Technician
text: [REACTION]: After this unit enters play, search the top 6 cards of your deck for an attachment or Drone card. Reveal it, add it to your hand, and place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Gun Drones
text: You may deploy this card as a Drone attachment with the text "Attach to a non-Vehicle army unit. Attached unit gains Area Effect (2). ".

name: Fireblade Kais'vre
text: [INTERRUPT]: When you use a [TAU] card as a shield card at this planet, it gains 1 shield icon.
flavor: "We draw the line here! Let them advance no further!" -Fireblade Kais'vre

name: Experimental Devilfish
text: [REACTION]: After this unit commits to a planet, ready it.
flavor: The Tau Earth Caste is constantly testing new technology at the frontline of Tau expansion.

name: Even the Odds
text: [ACTION]: Move a target attachment to another eligible unit controlled by the same player.
flavor: When faced with greater numbers, the Tau military tactic of Kauyon instructs a commander to ambush their foe by luring them into the open.

name: Calculated Strike
text: [ACTION]: Destroy a target Limited card.
flavor: When a planet refuses to join the Tau in the Greater Good, the Tau respond by crippling the planet's major industries before giving them a chance to reconsider.

name: Deception
text: [DEPLOY ACTION]: Return a target non-Elite army unit to its owner's hand.

name: Repulsor Impact Field
text:
Attach to an army unit.
Limit 1 per unit.
[REACTION]: After attached unit is damaged by an attack, deal 2 damage to the attacker.

name: Ion Rifle
text:
Attach to an army unit.
Attached unit gets +3 ATK.
flavor: Tau ion weapons can vaporize anything from flesh to ceramite with ease, breaking them apart at the atomic level.

name: Frontline Launch Bay
text: [INTERRUPT]: When you deploy a [TAU] unit, exhaust this support to reduce that unit's cost by 1.

name: Ambush Platform
text:
[INTERRUPT]: When you deploy an attachment, reduce its cost by 1.
[COMBAT ACTION]: Exhaust this support to deploy an attachment from your hand.

name: No Mercy
text: [INTERRUPT]: When an opponent uses a shield card, exhaust a unique unit you control to cancel that card's shielding effect.

name: Void Pirate
text: +1 [CARD] when command struggle won at this planet.
flavor: Renegades, mercenaries, and outcasts commonly form praticals bands on the fringes of the Imperium, raiding space lanes for plunder and glory.

name: Rogue Trader
text: +1 [RESOURCE] when command struggle won at this planet.
flavor: "You might as well throw a traveller through a sea of sharks and tell him to swim home as send him through he warp unprotected." -Fra Safrane, Rogue Trader

name: Fall Back!
text: [REACTION]: After an Elite unit is destroyed, put it into play from your discard pile at your HQ.

name: Promethium Mine
text:
[FORCED REACTION]: After this card enters play, place 4 [RESOURCE] on it.
[REACTION]: After the deploy phase begins, transfer 1 [RESOURCE] from this card to your resource pool.

name: Promotion
text:
Attach to an army unit.
Attached unit gains 2 command icons.

name: Plannum
text: [BATTLE ABILITY]: Move a non-warlord unit you control to a planet of your choice.

name: Atrox Prime
text: [BATTLE ABILITY]: Deal 1 damage to each enemy unit at a target HQ or adjacent planet.

name: Barlus
text: [BATTLE ABILITY]: Discard 1 card at random from your opponent's hand.

name: Elouith
text: [BATTLE ABILITY]: Search the top 3 cards of your deck for a card. Add it to your hand, and place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Carnath
text: [BATTLE ABILITY]: Trigger the Battle ability of another planet in play

name: Tarrus
text: [BATTLE ABILITY]: If you control fewer units than your opponent, gain 3 [RESOURCE] or draw 3 cards.

name: Osus Iv
text: [BATTLE ABILITY]: Take 1 [RESOURCE] from your opponent.

name: Ferrin
text: [BATTLE ABILITY]: Rout a target non-warlord unit.

name: Y'varn
text: [BATTLE ABILITY]: Each player puts a unit into play from his hand at his HQ.

name: Iridial
text: [BATTLE ABILITY]: Remove all damage from a target unit.
